body.p: Born on May 6, 1819 in Bardstown, Nelson County Kentucky. Nephew of Kentucky's 14th Governor Charles A. Wickliffe. Worked as a Lawyer in Ballard County, Kentucky. During the war, Wickliffe was a Colonel in command of the 7th Regiment Kentucky Mounted Infantry, CSA. Wickliffe was wounded at the battle of Shiloh. He died from his wounds on April 22, 1862 in Madison County Tennessee.
